BackupAgentHelper Class Reference

A convenient wrapper class that automatically manages heterogeneous data sets within the backup data, each identified by a unique key prefix. More...

#include <BackupAgentHelper.h>

Detailed Description

A convenient wrapper class that automatically manages heterogeneous data sets within the backup data, each identified by a unique key prefix.

When processing a backup or restore operation, the BackupAgentHelper dispatches to one or more installed objects, each of which is responsible for a defined subset of the data being processed.
